column1: Uchi////I was so impressed with this place! The food was amazing
column2: happy hour prices were friendly to my pocketbook
column4: and the ambiance pleasing and trendy. The best part about this place was the waitstaff; the presentation of the food was accompanied by a very tasty description of each dish
column5: detailed in such a way that my mouth was watering just listening to it! I LOVE this place.
